attributes.action: Minimum size for car parking spaces
attributes.additional_details: Car parking spaces at supermarkets, cinemas, multi-storey car parks etc. are too small. It is becoming increasingly difficult to get in and out of the car without banging your door on the car next to you. We therefore petition the government to create a legally enforceable minimum size for car parking spaces. The minimum size should be no smaller than 2.5m width by 5.5m length.
